title: Red list : threatened species 2019
summary: This bar chart has 22 columns on the x axis representing Threatened Species, and Number of species in each Threatened Species on the y axis.
The Number of species is appeared to be the highest at Threatened Species Flowering Plants and lowest at Threatened Species Green Algae.
The Number of species of Threatened Species Green Algae is 1493800000000000.0% smaller than the maximum value at Flowering Plants.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Threatened Species in the x axis and Number of species in the y axis.
Threatened Species Flowering Plants has the highest Number of species and Green Algae has the lowest Number of species.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of species for 22 number of Threatened Speciess.
Threatened Species Flowering Plants has the highest Number of species and Green Algae has the lowest Number of species.
The difference of Number of species between the highest and lowest Threatened Species is 14938.0.
The Threatened Species Flowering Plants has the highest Number of species, followed by , and Molluscs. Down to the Threatened Species Green Algae which is the lowest.
Threatened Species Velvet Worms, and Red Algae share the same value 9.0.
The Threatened Species Green Algae tends to be 10.89 percent lower than average.
The Number of species is 30178.0 if we add up values of all Threatened Speciess.
